summary: This bill, the Parity for Native Hawaiian Veterans Act of 2025, aims to improve benefits and care for Native Hawaiian veterans. It amends Title 38 of the United States Code to expand direct housing loan programs to include Native Hawaiians, mirroring benefits available to Native American veterans. Furthermore, it mandates the Department of Veterans Affairs to reimburse Native Hawaiian healthcare systems for care provided to veterans and exempts Native Hawaiians from certain cost-sharing policies for healthcare.
